amendment.description: An amendment printed in the Congressional Record of July 10, as amendment No. 5, that increases the appropriation for energy conservation programs by $50 million.

action.text: Mr. Regula raised a point of order against the Fox amendment (A030). Mr. Regula stated that the provisions of the amendment seek to amend text that has been previously amended, and is therefore not in order. The Chair sustained the point of order.
